323280.name: Sea Legends: Phantasmal Light Collector's Edition
323280.description:
Jane regains consciousness on the shore of a strange island. On the rock, which stands in the middle of the sea near the island, shines the Lighthouse. Mike, her husband, is not near, though she vaguely remembers that the wreck of the sea they were washed up together from this ship. Searching for Mike, Jane gradually understands that this island is a huge graveyard of ships. Gradually getting to know the island's history and the tragic story of a lighthouse keeper, Jane realizes what danger threatens her and Mike, if she couldn't save him. Play this colorful hidden object adventure, solve puzzles and unravel the dark secrets of the island and its strange lighthouse keeper. Can you outwit the ancient heritage and escape with Mike from the island?

Key features:

  • Explore 40 playable locations
  • Original game world
  • Solve tricky puzzles
  • Explore an island
  • 12 hidden object scenes
  • 15 mini-games
323280.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
